line.comment: * 3.16: On some rare occasions, it's possible to trigger the mission briefing twice due to a docking bug; we make sure we have not already accepted the same mission.
* The following subroutine can return to Exit:.
* Don't do anything, keep the mission available.
* START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text='Your map has been updated' icon='ok' timeout=null fadeout=null
* START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text='Your map has been updated' icon='ok' timeout=null fadeout=null

line.text: 'Все наши корабли оборудованы щитами и лазерами.'

line.comment: * We don't use Mayhem.BuildShipFromReserve because we want it unequipped and it's possible the ship has already been taken out from the reserve by the AI.
* Xenons are created when [PLAYERSHIP] goes to $sector, through !ship.signal.changesector.
* Don't create anymore asteroids if all of them are not already scanned.
* Pirates. (Add-Ons 1.3: Added Yaki Buzzard, Tonbo, and Buster. Also added 3 more possible quadrants for pirates to spawn in in addition to top-left)
* Add-Ons 1.4.4: Not needed; Mayhem.BuildShip -> Mayhem.EquipShip.Lasers handles MDS installation. If empty, then player must build more lasers at the outpost as intended.
* Insane mode doubles strength, a 33% increase compared to hard.

sval.val: Все наши корабли оборудованы щитами и лазерами.
3.16: On some rare occasions, it's possible to trigger the mission briefing twice due to a docking bug; we make sure we have not already accepted the same mission.
The following subroutine can return to Exit:.
Don't do anything, keep the mission available.
START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text='Your map has been updated' icon='ok' timeout=null fadeout=null
START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text='Your map has been updated' icon='ok' timeout=null fadeout=null
We don't use Mayhem.BuildShipFromReserve because we want it unequipped and it's possible the ship has already been taken out from the reserve by the AI.
Xenons are created when [PLAYERSHIP] goes to $sector, through !ship.signal.changesector.
Don't create anymore asteroids if all of them are not already scanned.
Pirates. (Add-Ons 1.3: Added Yaki Buzzard, Tonbo, and Buster. Also added 3 more possible quadrants for pirates to spawn in in addition to top-left)
Add-Ons 1.4.4: Not needed; Mayhem.BuildShip -> Mayhem.EquipShip.Lasers handles MDS installation. If empty, then player must build more lasers at the outpost as intended.
Insane mode doubles strength, a 33% increase compared to hard.
